mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) NUM, MEMBERVIEW.* FROM MEMBERVIEW WHERE ${field} LIKE '%${query}%' AND REGDATE BETWEEN CONVERT(DATE,#{startDate}) AND CONVERT(DATE,#{endDate})) M WHERE M.NUM BETWEEN 1+(${page}-1)*10 AND 10*${page}
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBERS SET( PASSWORD=#{PASSWORD}, BIRTH=${birth}, PHONE=#{phone}, EMAIL=#{email}, ADDRESS=#{address}, CLASSFICATION=#{classification}, ACADEMICABILITY=#{academicAbility}, MAJOR=#{major}, CAREERYEAR=${CAREERYEAR}, CAREER=#{career}, HOMEPAGE=#{homePage}, CURRENTSTATE=#{CURRENTSTATE}, HOPEBUSINESS=#{HOPEBUSINESS}, IMAGENAME=#{imageName}, INTRODUCE=#{introduce}, CURRENTSTATE=#{currentState}, UNIVERSITYNAME=#{universityName}, MAJOR=${major}, SCHOOLSTATE=#{schoolState}, HOPEBUSINESS=#{hopeBusiness}, CAREERYEAR=${careerYear} ) WHERE MID=#{mid}
